localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Reading and gaining knowledge shouldn't be a chore. Get one weekly Substack email digest from your favorite Substack writers.
blogPost.body: Reading and gaining knowledge shouldn't be a chore. Get one weekly Substack email digest from your favorite Substack writers.
blogPost.title: Thank you for reading - Personalized Substack summaries
blogPost.author: Tom Terado

localize.description: 阅读和获取知识不应该是一件苦差事。每周从您最喜欢的子栈作者那里获取一份子栈电子邮件摘要。
閱讀和獲取知識不應該是一件苦差事。每週從您最喜歡的子棧作者那裏獲取一份子棧電子郵件摘要。

previous.excerpt: Everything a senior needs in a single place. 70% of seniors are now online, but most of them still struggle to use the internet to its full potential. Urizen allows seniors to keep up with the pace and stay on top of their game.
previous.title: Urizen - A simpler Google for seniors

localize.description: 老年人所需的一切都在一个地方。现在70%的老年人都在上网，但他们中的大多数人仍然难以充分发挥互联网的潜力。Urizen可以让老年人跟上步伐，保持在游戏的顶端。
localize.tagline: 为老年人提供更简单的谷歌

localize.description: 老年人所需的一切都在一個地方。現在70%的老年人都在上網，但他們中的大多數人仍然難以充分發揮互聯網的潛力。Urizen可以讓老年人跟上步伐，保持在遊戲的頂端。
localize.tagline: 爲老年人提供更簡單的谷歌

next.excerpt: Say hello to Paperform V3! We’ve just released a bunch of new features that make Paperform easier to use than ever before. Features include **Guided Mode**, Slash Commands, Background videos and more.
next.title: Paperform V3 - The best form builder just got better.

localize.description: 跟Paperform V3打个招呼吧 我们刚刚发布了一系列新功能，使Paperform比以前更容易使用。功能包括**引导模式**、斜线命令、背景视频等。
localize.tagline: 最好的表格建立者只是变得更好。

localize.description: 跟Paperform V3打個招呼吧 我們剛剛發佈了一系列新功能，使Paperform比以前更容易使用。功能包括**引導模式**、斜線命令、背景視頻等。
localize.tagline: 最好的表格建立者只是變得更好。
